author: jwoolley
msg: Due to the explicit return in the "then" case, the "else" is not strictly
necessary, and IMO it's easier to read without wrapping that block in
an else {}.  I wrote the thing, and it tripped me up reading it the way
it was, so it MUST have been bad.  ;)

author: jwoolley
msg: file_bucket_read() is not the only caller of file_make_mmap().
file_bucket_setaside() does it as well, and that call was missed when
the can_mmap flag was added.  This patch moves the can_mmap test to
a central location to avoid that problem.

author: sascha
msg: Enable autoconf/autoheader to be redefined by users.

author: bnicholes
msg: Added apr_strmatch.c to the aprlib make file

author: rbb
msg: Fix the docs for the brigade buffering functions
